data.prayer: Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the county of Liaoyang, Liaoning, China.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Liaoyang, Liaoning, China
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage those who are afraid in Liaoyang, Liaoning, China that you are the healer and you are the Savior.
data.verse: Heal me, Lord, and I will be healed; save me and I will be saved, for you are the one I praise.

data.prayer: Father, convict the 141,086 believers in Liaoyang to be holy and righteous. Inspire them to gather in small groups for accountability and spiritual growth.
Father, remind your church in Liaoyang that they can know and depend on the love you have for them.
data.verse: We know and have believed the love which God has for us. God is love, and he who remains in love remains in God, and God remains in him.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Xibe people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Xibe people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Xibe people is yours.
Father, let those from the 141,086 believers who are shaken and weak remember that your love will never fail them.
data.verse: Love never fails. But where there are prophecies, they will be done away with. Where there are various languages, they will cease. Where there is knowledge, it will be done away with.

data.prayer: Father, put your Bible in the hands of the 1,688,669, who are far from you and live in this place.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your Word. I seek you with all my heart; do not let me stray from your commands.

data.section_summary:
the county of Liaoyang, Liaoning, China has a population of 1,859,800.

We estimate Liaoyang has 141,086 people who might know Jesus, 30,045 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,688,669 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, please help the 141,086 believers in the county of Liaoyang to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.
